notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: José Realino de Paula and Gilberto L.B. de Aquino conceived idea of research and designed the experiments; Giuliana M. Vila Verde and Diogo A. Barros performed the experiments; Danilo M. Santos analyzed statistical data; Lucas D. Dias and Marta Piñeiro analyzed the green Eco-scale; José Realino de Paula contributed with reagents/materials. Mariette M. Pereira analyzed the oil composition; Giuliana M. Vila Verde and Marilene Silva Oliveira wrote the paper.
